terms.subtitle: By using our services, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined below.
terms.text1: We provide website creation services. Each project includes a mockup, provided at the client's request.
terms.text2: The created websites remain our intellectual property, and we are the exclusive creators of the sites. They cannot be attributed to other parties without our explicit consent.
terms.text3: A 20% deposit is required before the start of the project. Once the quote is signed, the project is considered accepted.
terms.text4: We offer to manage the renewal of hosting every year or for a longer duration, according to the client's request.
terms.text5: For any questions or concerns, please contact us at the following email address:
